productVariation: Slate Gray with Black Silicone Band
pvName: fēnix® 8 – 47 mm, AMOLED, Slate Gray with Black Silicone Band
shippingDisclaimer: Ready to ship in 1–3 business days.

seo.title: Garmin fēnix® 8 | Premium Multisport Smartwatch | 47mm
seo.ogDescription: fēnix® 8 is a premium multisport smartwatch with battery life for weeks, built-in speaker & mic, advanced training features & LED flashlight.

overviewTab.title: Overview

mapsTab.title: Maps
mapsTab.content:
Maps for New Regions

Need maps for regions other than the ones that came on your device? See all maps that are compatible with your device.

Need a map update?

Update the maps that came with your device for the best navigation experience.

Check for Updates

inTheBoxTab.content:
fēnix® 8 – 47 mm, AMOLED

fēnix® 8 – 47 mm, AMOLED, Sapphire, Titanium with Vented Titanium Bracelet

  • Charging/data cable
  • Documentation

QuickFit® watch band compatibleIncluded (22 mm)
Physical size47 x 47 x 13.8 mm
Fits wrists with the following circumference:
Silicone band: 125-208 mm
UltraFit band: 125-215 mm
Leather band: 132-210 mm
Metal band: 132-210 mm
WeightStainless Steel: 80 g (case only: 59 g)
Titanium: 73 g (case only: 52 g)

Built-in speaker/microphone

Display Resolution454 x 454 pixels

Battery lifeSmartwatch: Up to 16 days (7 days always-on)
Battery Saver Watch Mode: Up to 23 days
GPS Only: Up to 47 hours (37 hours always-on)
All Satellite Systems: Up to 38 hours (30 hours always-on)
All Satellite Systems + Multi-band: Up to 35 hours (28 hours always-on)*
All Satellite Systems + Music: Up to 10 hours
Max Battery GPS: Up to 81 hours
Expedition GPS: Up to 17 days
*Assuming typical use with SatIQ technology
Charging methodGarmin proprietary plug charger
Memory/History32 GB
